name: Marker's Point
description:
(STILL NOT POLISHED)

A short game.

  • Survive as best as you can.
  • You're a turret on screen, that aims to the cursor.
  • Click to fire, indicators are in place to show range and when firing.
  • What are you shooting at? The things going towards you?
  • Speaking of which, the longer you survive, the faster enemies get. Shooting can push them back a bit and halves their speed for 2 seconds.
  • The longer you survive the better the score multiplier is.
  • You want more of a Challenge? You can increase the Enemy Count! THERE IS NO CAP, till your PC breaks I guess...

Disclaimer: Hi-score and Best Time are not saved as this is a browser game, unless I learn to save to cache :)

If you would like , do share a screenshot of you best at Comments :)
